The umabari or bashin was apparently used for acupuncture and perhaps 
minor
surgery on horses. I was skeptical of the acupuncture idea




jim und all,
I think it's a wee bit too big for acupunture.
OTOH, the novice acupunturist would not miss any  " energy points " 
with a big needle like that...........
=)

-m
